name: Tribes: A New World
description:
Tribes: A New World is a game for the Optical Jam #3 based on the following image, that has been used as the map and the emblem of the tribes:

You have to conquer an island in the name of your tribe.
You do this in a risk-like manner, combined with realtime battles.

Changelog:

1.0.0 - initial jam version with unfortunately no music and a not really existent balancing
